name: Translation for Business and Media
description: Guided by translation theories and techniques, students learn the lexicon, structure, and style used in business and media discourse and gain hands-on experience in translating real-life documents regarding business and media for large Chinese communities within Canada.
prerequisites: ECTB61H3 and [LGGC64H3 or LGGC65H3 or LGGC66H3 or LGGC67H3]. Students must have a minimum GPA of 70% in LGGC64H or LGGC65H (or an equivalent through an interview).
